    • Method Detail

      • makeNextMove

        public void makeNextMove()
        Decides, which move the AI makes. This method is called when the state of the player changes and when the server sends the message that the last move was invalid.

      • acceptTrade

        public void acceptTrade(Trade trade)
        Consider whether accept this trade and make decision.
        Parameters:
        trade - the Trade which one player offered

      • executeTrade

        public void executeTrade(Player fellowPlayer,
                         Trade trade,
                         int playersNumber)
        Consider weather execute trade with this fellow Player and make decision.
        Parameters:
        fellowPlayer - the player, who has accept this trade
        trade - the offered trade
        playersNumber - the number of players in game
        See Also:
        Trade, Game

      • cancelTrade

        public void cancelTrade(Trade trade)
        Cancel the Trade.
        Parameters:
        trade - the offered trade or the accepted trade

      • resetTradeActor

        public void resetTradeActor()
        Reset the set of players, who has accepted or declined the trade.

      • addTradeActor

        public void addTradeActor(Player player)
        One more player has accepted or declined the trade.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who accepted or declined the trade

      • minusTradeActor

        public void minusTradeActor(Player player)
        One player has withdraw the accept.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who withdraw the accept

      • willIWin

        public int willIWin(Trade trade)
        Calculate additional win ratio after this Trade.
        Parameters:
        trade - the Trade which one player offered
        Returns:
        the additional win ratio

      • willILose

        public int willILose(Trade trade)
        Calculate additional lose ratio after this Trade.
        Parameters:
        trade - the Trade which one player offered
        Returns:
        the additional lose level
